member.name: T:FSF.Thullo.Api.Controllers.BoardsController
member.summary: This controller provides an interface for working with boards. Boards are the root/parent resource to lists and cards.

member.name: M:FSF.Thullo.Api.Controllers.BoardsController.#ctor(FSF.Thullo.Core.Services.ThulloService)
member.param: Delegation service for Thullo business logic.

member.name: M:FSF.Thullo.Api.Controllers.BoardsController.Post(FSF.Thullo.Core.Dto.BoardDtos.BoardForCreationDto)
member.param: The representation of the new board to be created.

member.name: M:FSF.Thullo.Api.Controllers.BoardsController.Put(System.Int32,FSF.Thullo.Core.Dto.BoardDtos.BoardForUpdateDto)
member.param: The updated representation of the board.
member.returns: The updated representation of the board.

member.name: T:FSF.Thullo.Api.Controllers.CardsController
member.summary: This controller provides an interface for working with cards. Cards have a many to one relationship with a given list. A Card is a subresources of a List.

member.name: M:FSF.Thullo.Api.Controllers.CardsController.#ctor(FSF.Thullo.Core.Services.ThulloService)
member.param: Delegation service for Thullo business logic.

member.name: M:FSF.Thullo.Api.Controllers.CardsController.Get(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets all cards belonging to a list.

member.name: M:FSF.Thullo.Api.Controllers.CardsController.Post(System.Int32,System.Int32,FSF.Thullo.Core.Dto.CardDtos.CardforCreationDto)
member.summary: Creates a new card associated to a list.
member.param: The representation of the new card.

member.name: M:FSF.Thullo.Api.Controllers.CardsController.Put(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,FSF.Thullo.Core.Dto.CardDtos.CardForUpdateDto)
member.param: The updated representation of the card.

member.name: T:FSF.Thullo.Api.Controllers.ListsController
member.summary: This controller provides an interface for working with lists. Lists have a many to one relationship with a given board. A list is a subresource of a board.

member.name: M:FSF.Thullo.Api.Controllers.ListsController.#ctor(FSF.Thullo.Core.Services.ThulloService)
member.param: Delegation service for Thullo business logic.

member.name: M:FSF.Thullo.Api.Controllers.ListsController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets all lists belonging to a board.
member.param: The id of the board you want to get all lists for.
member.returns: The lists that belong to the specified board.

member.name: M:FSF.Thullo.Api.Controllers.ListsController.Get(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a single list belonging to a board.
member.param: The id of the board you want to get a list for.
The id of the list you want.
member.returns: The list that belongs to the specified board.

member.name: M:FSF.Thullo.Api.Controllers.ListsController.Post(System.Int32,FSF.Thullo.Core.Dto.ListDtos.ListForCreationDto)
member.summary: Creates/Adds a new list associated to a board.
member.param: The id of the board you want add a list to.
The representation of the new list being created.

member.name: M:FSF.Thullo.Api.Controllers.ListsController.Put(System.Int32,System.Int32,FSF.Thullo.Core.Dto.ListDtos.ListForUpdateDto)
member.summary: Updates a single list belonging to a board.
member.param: The id of the board that the list being updated belongs to.
The id of the list that you want to update.
member.returns: The updated representation of the list.

member.name: M:FSF.Thullo.Api.Controllers.ListsController.Delete(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a list from a given board.
member.param: The id of the board that the list being deleted belongs to.
The id of the list that you want to delete.
